emuInput.TitMainTitle: Soldiers from 372nd Infantry standing with rifles at their sides, in formation on Kennard Field
emuInput.PhyMediumComments: black-and-white: Agfa Superpan Supreme safety film
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, National Edition, July 11, 1942, pg. 14, reads: "Pittsburghers Hail Fighting Men from New York's 372nd Infantry and Fort Riley's Ninth Calvary - Pittsburgh was full of military spirit over the holidays when members of two famous colored units of the United States Army participated in colorful displays of military routine... Lower center: Another shot of the 372nd during maneuvers [illegible] the Terrace Village encampment... Harris [illegible] photos."
